page.title: 17J.FOTHERINGHAM,ULLAPOOL.
page.content: There is beautiful scenery around Ullapool.Heather-covered hills surround Lochbroom.Deer and sheep paths can be seen dotted around the hillside. Up high,rocky mountain slopes jut out from the rough hillside.There are many colours;green forests,purple heather, grey rocks and many shades of blue in the loch. After peats have been cut,they can be seen in stacks,drying out,black against the hillside. At the bottom of the valley there are green fields,with small crofts and farms spread around. The blue sky and grey clouds,high above,make it all look a wonderful picture.
